dependencies: Docker images (from docker-compose.yml): itzg/minecraft-server, itzg/rcon, itzg/bungeecord, itzg/mc-backup
architectural_resources: Minecraft server application (Paper) exposed on TCP 25565 (and 25575 for RCON)
RCON web admin service exposed on 4326/4327
Backup service producing periodic world backups to host-mounted storage (./mc-backups)
Persistent host-mounted volumes/directories for game data and plugins: ./data/lobby, ./plugins/lobby, ./data/proxy, ./plugins/proxy, ./data/rcon
Container networking between services (lobby as upstream for rcon/proxy/backup)
